new:
The restoration of Fort Gritten is steadily progressing. Fortunately, the morale of Vanessa and the Hidell Plains Defense Corps remains high. However, we must admit our negligence and take measures to handle the enemy's invasion. It can be considered a valuable experience.

Now, after a long time, the《Blood Orb》has been brought before the White Dragon. Leo's new and promising Arisen acquired it. Indeed, they show great potential.

With this, the petrification of the White Dragon will be healed, slowing down its progress. Although the effect is temporary and only a palliative measure, there is no other method available to us at the moment.

Some may have a pessimistic view, but it is best to consider that we have discovered an effective method.
